text.div:
Release Date: 2014-12-11

OID for code system: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.65

OID for value set: 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.10975 (this is the value set that includes the entire code system)

Description

Tells a receiver to ignore just the local markup tags (local_markup, local_header, local_attr) when value="markup", or to ignore the local markup tags and all contained content when value="all"

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1all all
1markup markup

name: v3 Code System LocalMarkupIgnore
description: Tells a receiver to ignore just the local markup tags (local_markup, local_header, local_attr) when value="markup", or to ignore the local markup tags and all contained content when value="all"
